member.name: M:BusTrackerWeb.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:BusTrackerWeb.Models.PtvApiSignitureModel
member.summary: This class models a PTV API URL Request signer with a HMAC-SHA1 hash. As per document: PTV 2016,PTV Timetable API – API Key and Signature information', https://static.ptv.vic.gov.au/PTV/PTV%20docs/API/1475462320/PTV-Timetable-API-key-and-signature-document.RTF.

member.name: P:BusTrackerWeb.Models.PtvApiSignitureModel.ApiKey
member.summary: The unique API Key provided by PTV.

member.name: P:BusTrackerWeb.Models.PtvApiSignitureModel.ApiDeveloperId
member.summary: The Developer Id provided by PTV.

member.name: M:BusTrackerWeb.Models.PtvApiSignitureModel.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Custom constuctor to initilise class properties.
member.param: The unique API Key provided by PTV.
The Developer Id provided by PTV.

member.name: M:BusTrackerWeb.Models.PtvApiSignitureModel.SignApiUrl(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This function concatenates the request Url with the Developer ID before using a HMACSHA1 hash function to generate a request signiture. The base Url, request Url and signture are then formated into a single signed Url.
member.param: PTV API base Url without API request.
